title: Einstein's Dreams - "the way a leaf falls..."

content.question: In context, "the way a leaf falls from a tree" (end of first major paragraph) suggests which of the following about the conversations of the Laters?

choices.label: They are often random and casual.
They are of very short duration.
They deal with topics related to nature.

content.answer: They are often random and casual.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
